error.geolocation.denied: User denied the request for Geolocation.
error.geolocation.timeout: The request to get user location timed out.
error.geolocation.unsupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
hint.geolocation.checkSettings: Check your device's location settings and network connection.
hint.geolocation.enableLocation: Please enable location services in your browser settings.
hint.geolocation.moveToBetterSignal: Try moving to an area with better signal.
hint.geolocation.outOfRange: You are out of the allowed range. Please move closer.
hint.geolocation.unsupportedBrowser: Your browser does not support Geolocation. Please use a different browser.
